results.content: I love how the course is short but packed with everything you need to know in order to create your own calculator. This course is definitely a 5 star course!
results.content_html: I love how the course is short but packed with everything you need to know in order to create your own calculator. This course is definitely a 5 star course!

results.content: A good hands on course which connects the dots between html and angular. I was, however, hoping that this course have more of an Angular focus rather than html and css focus.
results.content_html: A good hands on course which connects the dots between html and angular. I was, however, hoping that this course have more of an Angular focus rather than html and css focus.

results.content: The only issue (big impact) is that this class is broken into two major categories: HTML & CSS and angularjs; the course is structured 70%~ HTML and 30% angular. if you have a solid background in css and HTML i don't recommend this course.
results.content_html: The only issue (big impact) is that this class is broken into two major categories: HTML & CSS and angularjs; the course is structured 70%~ HTML and 30% angular. if you have a solid background in css and HTML i don't recommend this course.

results.content: This is a practical course where you put it all together into a project. I would say this is a intermediate-advanced course. The course is mostly splitted in 10% html, 60% css, and 30% angularjs. So far, it works for me as in landing all my previous knowledge  in programming and seeing a final product/project after several lines of code.
results.content_html: This is a practical course where you put it all together into a project. I would say this is a intermediate-advanced course. The course is mostly splitted in 10% html, 60% css, and 30% angularjs. So far, it works for me as in landing all my previous knowledge in programming and seeing a final product/project after several lines of code.

results.content: The instructor,Chris , takes great care in his explanations such that very little is left to one's imagination.  The code does work/run which gives the student a successful outcome.  The class was most definitely was worth my time.  If there are other courses offered by Mr. Chris Converse, I will consider them.
results.content_html: The instructor,Chris , takes great care in his explanations such that very little is left to one's imagination. The code does work/run which gives the student a successful outcome. The class was most definitely was worth my time. If there are other courses offered by Mr. Chris Converse, I will consider them.

results.content: This was a really good course to make a real working app with AngularJS. I liked it so much I bought some of Chris's other courses too.
results.content_html: This was a really good course to make a real working app with AngularJS. I liked it so much I bought some of Chris's other courses too.

results.content: It hit the road running, so to speak, which was ideal for my requirements. Well explained and described a new concept to me very well, which I can now apply to my own projects. Many thanks.
results.content_html: It hit the road running, so to speak, which was ideal for my requirements. Well explained and described a new concept to me very well, which I can now apply to my own projects. Many thanks.

results.content:
Chris has obviously thought this through... such a clear, smooth and concise demo of a cool, self-contained AngularJS app.  His CSS samples taught me some things I was unaware of in CSS...

Overall - great course.
results.content_html:
Chris has obviously thought this through... such a clear, smooth and concise demo of a cool, self-contained AngularJS app. His CSS samples taught me some things I was unaware of in CSS...

Overall - great course.

results.content: Great AngularJS tut. Very clear and concise. I would take more of this instructors tutorials!
